Title: Requires all actions for personal injury or wrongful death to include a general prayer for relief
Summary: Requires the summons with notice in a cause of action for personal injury or wrongful death to include a prayer for general relief.
LawCode: Amd R305 & ยง3017, CPLR; amd ยง50-e, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to requiring all personal injury or wrongful death causes of action to include a prayer for general relief; and to amend the general municipal law, in relation to exempting notices of claim from such requirement
